actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_weapon_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 6 6
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health FLAT origin_aoe2 70 70
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe3 5 5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact health_regen FLAT origin_aoe4 25 25
age_of_exile stat give @s exact mana GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe5 -25 -25
age_of_exile stat give @s exact physical_health_leech FLAT origin_aoe6 10 10

name: 능력치
description:
무기 피해량과 체력,체력 재생이 증가하고, 마나가 감소합니다.
§f§l특수 능력치 : 물리 피해 흡혈 +10%
